name: Door
description:
This is RPG
When magic comes to the world
Endless monsters surrounded the whole city
Everyone can only stay at home
No going out
Because: once you go out, you will never find the door to go home
But: how to solve the food problem?
You will play a man who loves his wife
To find food for his wife
Go out bravely
What's waiting for you?
Monster or magic?
Or???
Bravely use the weapons in hand to fight for the right to survive!
Players can kill monsters outside to get booty
Make the most of the spoils
The whole expedition has just been completed
